name: Outstanding Amount
query:
select 
	si.customer as "Customer:Link/Customer:180",
	si.contact_display as "Contact::160",
	si.contact_mobile as "Mobile::160",
	si.territory as "Territory::120",
	sum(si.outstanding_amount) as "Outstanding Amt:Currency:120",
	(SELECT 
		sum(outstanding_amount) 
	FROM 
		`tabSales Invoice` 
	WHERE 
		outstanding_amount > 0
		and docstatus = 1
		and naming_series != 'SINV-MAC-'
		and naming_series != 'OMSINV-'
		and naming_series != 'SINV/MAC/18-19/'
		and posting_date < DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL -30 DAY)
		and customer = si.customer) as "Above 30 days:Currency:100"
from 
	`tabSales Invoice` si
where
	si.outstanding_amount > 0
	and si.docstatus = 1
	and si.naming_series != 'SINV-MAC-'
	and si.naming_series != 'OMSINV-'
	and naming_series != 'SINV/MAC/18-19/'
group by si.customer
order by si.customer asc
